item.title: MIUI V12.0.3.0.QJOTRXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 9 Turkey
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 9 Turkey

Codename: merlin

Version: V12.0.3.0.QJOTRXM | 10.0

Size: 3.4 GB

MD5: 9803d2fb110e4d573571408b20bd5732

Changelog:
[Control center]
New: Tapping a blank spot in Control center closes it now
Optimization: Control center layout in landscape mode
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to November 2020. Increased system security.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V12.0.5.0.QJORUXM Recovery update for Redmi Note 9 Russia
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi Note 9 Russia

Codename: merlin

Version: V12.0.5.0.QJORUXM | 10.0

Size: 2.1 GB

MD5: 06ab1e4ff8c52e2d4a849f4734285b3f

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Overall response speed
Optimization: We increased app launch speed
Optimization: Multiple system features are more responsive now
Fix: Multiple issues triggered by insufficient RAM resources
Updated Android Security Patch to February 2021. Increased system security.
Several inessential features will become temporarily unavailable due to the necessity of major fixes and optimizations.
[Camera]
Optimization: Camera works faster and better now

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
